content.query:
CREATE TABLE VehicleTollBooth
(
	Make varchar(100),
	Model varchar(100),
	VehicleType int,
	State varchar(10),
	TollAmount int
)

SELECT * FROM VehicleTollBooth

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VehicleTollBooth

CREATE TABLE WebMetrics
(
    Minimum decimal,
    Maximum decimal,
    Average decimal,
    Metrictime DATETIME,
    MetricName VARCHAR(200)
)

SELECT * FROM WebMetrics
